text: Exacum is a genus of plant in family Gentianaceae. It contains the following species (but this list is incomplete): * Exacum affine Balf.f. ex Regel * Exacum axillare * Exacum bicolor * Exacum caeruleum Balf.f. * Exacum pallidum * Exacum pedunculatum * Exacum sessile * Exacum socotranum Balf.f. * Exacum tetragonum * Exacum tinervium * Exacum travancoricum * Exacum walkeri ==References== Category:Gentianaceae genera Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Exacum
